mainImage.text1:
To today's audiences, he's the personification of Strictly Come Dancing. But to earlier ones he's Play Your Cards Right or Sunday Night at the London Palladium - and, for millions, he's forever linked to The Generation Game.
Trace Bruce Forsyth's amazing career through photos and Radio Times covers from the 1960s to today.
mainImage.text2: Brucie earns his first-ever Radio Times cover in time for his 1965 Christmas special. (Image © Radio Times)
